about_the_game:
A century from now, Earth has become too burdened, and humanity sets its sights on the stars and the endless expanse of the universe. You are a child who spent most of your life on the Moon, surrounded by canned and artificial foods. Recalling the desserts you enjoyed as a child, you make the bold decision to open a cafe in this barren, steel-clad world.

To keep your cafe afloat, you must earn money and constantly innovate to keep your customers satisfied. You have the option to cultivate the crops necessary for your desserts and drinks, or you can revamp the cafe's interior to match your personal taste.

Throughout this adventure, you will encounter some unique guests. By offering them your desserts, you will gain their trust, uncover their hidden stories, and perhaps even recruit them to join your team.

Welcome to Cafe on the Moon. We hope you enjoy your time here.

Game Features:

  • [Ingredient Combinations at Your Discretion]

In the game, you can mix and match various ingredients and use different cooking techniques to craft the desserts you envision. Let your creativity shine!

  • [Unlock Diverse Decor Options]

Acquire blueprints from different characters to transform your cafe into the style you prefer.

[Meet Unique Guests and Unravel Their Tales]

You will have the chance to meet a diverse array of guests at the cafe, each with their own distinct backgrounds and intriguing stories. Use your desserts to charm them and you might be in for some delightful surprises.

  • [Interact Freely with Guests] (Coming Soon)

In the future, we plan to integrate a trained language model that will allow you to engage in conversations with various characters, offering you a deeper understanding of their personalities beyond the storyline. Stay tuned!

A century from now, Earth has become too burdened, and humanity sets its sights on the stars and the endless expanse of the universe. You are a child who spent most of your life on the Moon, surrounded by canned and artificial foods. Recalling the desserts you enjoyed as a child, you make the bold decision to open a cafe in this barren, steel-clad world.

To keep your cafe afloat, you must earn money and constantly innovate to keep your customers satisfied. You have the option to cultivate the crops necessary for your desserts and drinks, or you can revamp the cafe's interior to match your personal taste.

Throughout this adventure, you will encounter some unique guests. By offering them your desserts, you will gain their trust, uncover their hidden stories, and perhaps even recruit them to join your team.

Welcome to Cafe on the Moon. We hope you enjoy your time here.

  • [Ingredient Combinations at Your Discretion]

In the game, you can mix and match various ingredients and use different cooking techniques to craft the desserts you envision. Let your creativity shine!

Acquire blueprints from different characters to transform your cafe into the style you prefer.

[Meet Unique Guests and Unravel Their Tales]

You will have the chance to meet a diverse array of guests at the cafe, each with their own distinct backgrounds and intriguing stories. Use your desserts to charm them and you might be in for some delightful surprises.

In the future, we plan to integrate a trained language model that will allow you to engage in conversations with various characters, offering you a deeper understanding of their personalities beyond the storyline. Stay tuned!
name: 月上咖啡店-Cafe on the moon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: inter core i3 2.0GHz、AMD Ryzen 3 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • VR Support: NO
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: inter core i5 3.0GHz 、AMD Ryzen 5 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
  • VR Support: NO

short_description: “Cafe on the Moon” is a simulation management game and a visual novel. In this game, you step into the role of a new Cafe owner on the desolate Moon, where your mission is to create a variety of desserts. As you progress, you'll uncover the mysterious secrets hidden beneath the tranquil moonlight.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
